p: Group 1 samples (600 g) were divided into 03 identical subgroups of 200 g each, coded FBWN 60 min, TRFWN 30 min, and FWN. FBWN 60 min was boiled in 2 L of water at about 100°C for a period of 60 min. TRFWN 30 min was traditionally roasted in a cooking pot at 200–220°C by continous stirring for 30 min and FWN served as fresh control.
